subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Gonzalez hit three more homers on Wednesday, giving him five in three games. And while it is fun to project, it is also worthwhile to recall a Cub named Tuffy Rhodes.
snippet: Gonzalez hit three more homers on Wednesday, giving him five in three games. And while it is fun to project, it is also worthwhile to recall a Cub named Tuffy Rhodes.
